text: Together is an album by saxophonist Eric Kloss which features pianist Barry Miles and was recorded in 1976 and released on the Muse label.Muse Records discography accessed May 26, 2015Eric Kloss discography accessed May 26, 2015 ==Reception== Allmusic awarded the album 2½ stars.Allmusic listing accessed May 26, 2015 == Track listing == All compositions by Eric Kloss except as indicated # "Relay" (Barry Miles) - 6:58 # "The Wise Woman" - 6:24 # "Together" (Kloss, Miles) - 6:09 # "Song for a Mountain" (Miles) - 4:19 # "The Goddess, the Gypsy & the Light" - 13:05 # "Opus De Mulier" - 1:55 == Personnel == *Eric Kloss - alto saxophone, tenor saxophone *Barry Miles - piano, electric piano, synthesizer == References == Category:Eric Kloss albums Category:Barry Miles (musician) albums Category:1977 albums Category:Muse Records albums
title: Together (Eric Kloss and Barry Miles album)
